result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Arthur Reynolds

records.addlTxt: Judicial Pretrial - in court on November 9, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
JPTC adj from 10/19 to 11/9 @ 2pm on court's motion; court unavailable on previously scheduled date/time.
Scheduling Order

State appears by Attorney Alexandra Smathers. Attorney Donald J Bielski in court with Defendant Arthur Reynolds.  Clerk: PU
 Minutes:  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found.  Bound over.   Information filed; reading waived.  Not guilty plea entered. Scheduling Order given to Attorney in court.  Bond continued.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.
at the request of Atty Bielski, PH is rescheduled from 08-02-22  to 08-10-22 at 10am Intake.  DA notified.
Preliminary hearing on August 2, 2022 at 10:15 am.

Defendant, Arthur Reynolds, appeared.  Attorney Brendaliz Valdes appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Atty Bielski is ill and unavailable today.     DE waives time for preliminary hearing.  Bond continued.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 2, 2022 at 10:15 am.
Atty Donald Bielski
on Petition for Appointment of an Attorney
Preliminary hearing on July 14, 2022 at 09:45 am.

03:00 PM    Assistant District Attorney Brenda Valdes appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 09:45 am..   Cash bond posted and continued w/ same conditions (see previous bond entry). Attorney Bielski appointed advocate counsel today. rb
No Attorney Assigned
re: Judicial Rotation 8/1/22 mailed to DE
Adjourned initial appearance on June 28, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

02:47 - 02:49 PM  Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State under the supervision of Attorney Burgoyne.   Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk PU.   Def. is referred to the Public Defender.  If not eligible, def. to retain his own counsel. Court date will not be adjourned due to def.'s failure to retain counsel. Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 28, 2022 at 01:00 pm..  Bond continued as previously set (see previous bond entry). rb

MINUTES:  No appearance by defendant.  Court authorizes a bench warrant for defendant's arrest with a $750 cash bond and forfeits defendant's signature bond. Defendant most post or may not be released.
